home-page.communicate-blurb: Choose an avatar to represent you, put on your headphones, and jump right in. Hubs makes it easy to stay connected with voice and text chat to other people in your private room.
home-page.have-code: Vous avez un code de room?
home-page.media-blurb: Share content with others in your room by dragging and dropping photos, videos, PDF files, links, and 3D models into your space.
home-page.media-title: An easier way to share media
home-page.rooms-blurb: Share virtual spaces with your friends, co-workers, and communities. When you create a room with Hubs, you‚Äôll have a private virtual meeting space that you can instantly share - no downloads or VR headset necessary.
hubs-cloud-page.features.diy-events-desc: With Hubs Cloud, you can enable your own virtual events infrastructure by tailoring your deployment to meet your own needs for uptime, concurrency, and account needs.
hubs-cloud-page.features.self-hosted-des: With Hubs Cloud, your deployment is on your own organization‚Äôs infrastructure, keeping your sensitive data private and secure within an AWS account your team owns.
hubs-cloud-page.features.usage-pricing-d: Your cost to run Hubs Cloud will be dependent on the size of your deployed instances, bandwidth, and storage used. All billing is handled through AWS, so you‚Äôll get visibility into charges at every step of the process.
hubs-cloud-page.hero-content: Hubs Cloud creates and manages all of the AWS resources needed to host your own immersive spaces from your company or organization‚Äôs own account. Bring your own domain or use Route53 to create a new site, running on a single EC2 instance or scaled up to multiple servers for greater system-wide concurrency. Easily customize your platform with your own branding, upload your own 3D content, or select from the vast array of avatars and scenes licensed under Creative Commons for the Hubs platform.
hubs-cloud-page.hero-cta: Get it today on the AWS Marketplace
